structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: When the records of the county surveyor have been lost, mutilated or destroyed, they shall be supplied upon request of the county surveyor and county judge/executive from the records of the land office.
law.history: Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 249, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1988. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4679a-1.
